name: Perry Rhodan: Thoregon - Die verbotene Stadt
summary: A new exciting adventure from the Thoregon cycle. Perry Rhodan will find a hostile world, a strange city with bizarre inhabitants. His goal is to escape from there. He has to find a spaceship, whatever the cost. But this is a dangerous endeavor that requires empathy, elbow, intelligence, humor, and cooperativeness. An exciting game with impressive graphics, communication with all living beings and a user-friendly interface.
